services.title: Business Services
services.description: Running a business is hard, leave the tech for a technologist. Website design, content creation, business cards, graphic design, email servers, networking, marketing, hosting and domain name provisioning, search engine optimization, and more.

services.title: Mobile Apps
services.description: Have an existing app? Want an app? Have an idea to pitch? Using my eye for design and mobile experience we can ship and maintain world-class applications to both the Apple and Android marketplace.

services.title: Security Consulting
services.description: A passion of mine has been getting into devices, places, and accounts that I am not supposed to be. From physical security (doors, locks, and people) to application and device security. I can do a one stop security audit and facilitate a plan to mitigate risk and exposure.
